code.value:
# from langflow.field_typing import Data
from langflow.field_typing import Tool
from langflow.custom import Component
from langflow.io import MessageTextInput, DropdownInput, StrInput, IntInput, Output
from langflow.schema.message import Message
from langchain_community.tools import DuckDuckGoSearchRun
from langchain_community.utilities import DuckDuckGoSearchAPIWrapper


class DuckDuckGo(Component):
    display_name = "Tool_DuckDuckGoSearchRun"
    description = "Tool to search with DuckDuckGo."
    documentation: str = "http://docs.langflow.org/components/custom"
    icon = "custom_components"
    name = "Tool_DuckDuckGoSearchRun"

    inputs = [
        IntInput(name="n_results", display_name="Number of results", value=1, advanced=True),
        DropdownInput(name="safesearch", display_name="Level of safety", options=["strict", "moderate", "off"], value="moderate", advanced=True),
        DropdownInput(name="source", display_name="Source", options=["text", "news"], value="text", advanced=True),
        DropdownInput(name="time", display_name="Time", options=["y", "m", "w", "d"], value="y", advanced=True),
        StrInput(name="region", display_name="Region", value="wt-wt", advanced=True)
    ]

    outputs = [
        Output(display_name="Search Tool", name="output", method="build_output"),
    ]

    def build_output(self) -> Tool:
        api_wrapper_options = {
            "backend":"api", # default value
            "max_results": self.n_results,
            "region": self.region,
            "safesearch": self.safesearch,
            "source": self.source,
            "time": self.time
            
        }
        # remove null values
        api_wrapper_options = {k:v for k,v in api_wrapper_options.items() if v is not None}
        tool = DuckDuckGoSearchRun(api_wrapper=DuckDuckGoSearchAPIWrapper(**api_wrapper_options))
        self.status = tool
        return tool # type: ignore
